lines.name: Luna
lines.text: Wh- Where am I?...

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: Wait...

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: Who are you?! Where's your voice coming from?

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: Huh? Where's my brother? I swear, if you've-

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: Why are we here?

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: I should go and find Altair.

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: Wake up, Adara...

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: Hmmm... You don't remember anything. Peculiar...

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: No need to fret. I can assure you, Altair is perfectly fine.

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: *Laughs* Why are we here? I remember asking that.

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: Why are you both here though? Hmmmm...

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: I guess you'll have to figure that out yourselves.

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: Goodbye for now.

lines.name: Sol
lines.text: Adara?...

lines.name: Sol
lines.text: Thank goodness, you're alive!

lines.name: Sol
lines.text: I was about to ask you the same thing.

lines.name: Sol
lines.text: The disembodied voice wasn't particularly helpful.

lines.name: Sol
lines.text: Hey Mr. Entity, mind letting us out! This isn't funny!

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: Altair? I'm the one who should be saying that.

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: Do you happen to remember how we got here?

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: So he spoke to you too...

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: *Laughs eerily*

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: Ah, dear Altair... I wanted to leave too...

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: Well, go on then. I'm not stopping you.

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: But a door or two might...

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: Huh... A bouncing magical orb. Not menacing at all.

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: I wonder what will happen if I fix it?

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: Do not get distracted, Adara. Fix the magical circuit. Maybe it'll open the door...

lines.name: Sol
lines.text: Hmmm... Why is that glowing orb stuck to the pedestal?

lines.name: Sol
lines.text: I should definitely put it back. Neaten up the place.

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: The orb seems to have been disconnected from this magical... wiring?

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: *Laughs* The magical force field is now stuck to me... Great.

lines.name: Sol
lines.text: The door seems locked.

lines.name: Sol
lines.text: Strange. It looks like it was ripped out of this... circuit?

lines.name: Sol
lines.text: Hmmm... The other mysterious orb is now stuck to my hand. Fun.

lines.name: Sol
lines.text: Maybe I can use this to put the orb back and open the door...

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: Well, that was interesting. I see you've acquired a glowing orb as well.

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: I reckon we combine our newfound 'abilities' to open this door.

lines.name: Sol
lines.text: Nevermind. Not the time for questions.

lines.name: Sol
lines.text: Do you think we can combine our newly acquired 'abilities' to open this door?

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: They seem to be quite useful.

lines.name: Luna
lines.text: The sooner we get out of here the better.

lines.name: Sol
lines.text: That wasn't nearly as challenging as I thought it would be- Big sister! You have an orb as well?

lines.name: Sol
lines.text: Let's get out of this place.

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: You tried to fix the world, one step at a time.

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: Found no path of least resistance, as you took on this climb.

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: You mended the broken pieces...

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: Bit by bit.

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: But the cracks grew larger without ever taking a hit...

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: A wish to fix the world?

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: Why would you not take it.

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: But how did your wish to save the world break it...

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: As you approached the tower.

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: Not knowing what it meant.

lines.name: Stella
lines.text: I wish you listened and stopped our...
